lyrics:
[Intro]
Oooooooo
Merry Christmas Saint Nick
Christmas comes this time each year
Oooooooo oooooooo

[Verse 1]
Well, way up north where the air gets cold
There's a tale about Christmas that you've all been told
And a real famous cat all dressed up in red
And he spends the whole year working out on his sled

[Chorus]
It's the little Saint Nick
(Ooooo, little Saint Nick)
It's the little Saint Nick
(Ooooo, little Saint Nick)

[Verse 2]
Just a little bobsled we call it old Saint Nick
But she'll walk a toboggan with a four speed stick
She's candy-apple red with a ski for a wheel
And when Santa hits the gas, man, just watch her peel!

[Chorus]
It's the little Saint Nick
(Ooooo, little Saint Nick)
It's the little Saint Nick
(Ooooo, little Saint Nick)

[Bridge]
Run run reindeer
Run run reindeer
Whoa
Run run reindeer
Run run reindeer
He don't miss no one

[Verse 2]
And hauling through the snow at a frightening speed
With a half a dozen deer with Rudy to lead
He's gotta wear his goggles because the snow really flies
And he's cruising every pad with a little surprise

[Chorus]
It's the little Saint Nick
(Ooooo, little Saint Nick)
It's the little Saint Nick
(Ooooo, little Saint Nick)

[Outro]
Ahhhhhh
Oooooooo
Merry Christmas Saint Nick
Christmas comes this time each year

Ahhhhhh
Oooooooo
Merry Christmas Saint Nick
Christmas comes this time each year

Ahhhhhh
Oooooooo
Merry Christmas Saint Nick
Christmas comes this time each year
